metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7581 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/routing/route_set.rb in Action Pack in Ruby on Rails 4.x before 4.2.5.1 and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (superfluous caching and memory consumption) by leveraging an application's use of a wildcard controller route.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
